meanings.definition: To inhale audibly through the nose to detect a smell.
meanings.sent1: The dog was sniffing the flowers in the garden.
meanings.sent2: I saw a bear sniffing around the campsite for food.
meanings.sent3: The detective was sniffing for clues in the mysterious case.
meanings.sent4: She was sniffing out the truth like a bloodhound on a scent.
meanings.sent5: The chef was sniffing the ingredients to ensure they were fresh.
